hypothesis_content.title: PEPE Volume Surge as Leading Indicator for Memecoin Broad Rally
hypothesis_content.statement: When PEPE experiences >200% volume surge relative to 10-day average while price remains within ±5% range, and BTC is in NEUTRAL/BULL regime, a broad memecoin rally (DOGE, BONK, WIF, FLOKI) will commence within 12 hours, with PEPE acting as momentum leader.
hypothesis_content.rationale: PEPE has emerged as sentiment proxy for Ethereum-based memecoins. Accumulation during high-volume, low-price-change periods often precedes coordinated moves across the memecoin complex as momentum traders follow the volume leader.
entry_conditions: PEPE price within ±5% of opening price during volume surge
No major crypto news events causing isolated PEPE movement

exit_conditions.take_profit: Broad memecoin index (5 tokens) achieves +15% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: PEPE price breaks below volume surge range low by >3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume surge remains isolated to PEPE without broader memecoin participation, or price immediately breaks down from accumulation range.
